name: Random House
description:
Hello, you are drowning in debt.

Random House is a horror shooter where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned casino rumored to be cursed. Every once in a while, the slot machines spin on their own volition and strange howls echo through the dilapidated halls.

At the heart of the casino lies a golden vault. Something has placed cards throughout the casino. Maybe finding them will help find a way to erase your debt?

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left-mouse button to shoot

Tab to [REDACTED]

Esc to quit
